content:
Since this is the first message in the stream: its purpose should be to ask feedback for our work.

I am in the fine-tuning stage of a paper, written together with @Th√©o and we would be glad to receive comments for improvement, before going on arXiv.

The paper (probably still with a few typos :grinning: ) is here: main.pdf

Thanks in advance!
@Matteo Capucci is that a reaction to the "session of calisthenics"?
